title: Baron

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- At the start of the game, two good players(determined by host) gain one of the following attributes:
Recluse: You may register as an ref, nk, nc, and ne, even while dead.
Saint: If lynched your team loses.
Butler: You may only vote if the person you targeted with your night action votes:
Drunk: You are not aware you are the drunk. Your ability might malfunction.
Malfunctioning is defined as your ability might fail / return false results.

desc:
Post 3663
*”This town has gone to the dogs, what? Cheap foreign labor... that's the ticket. Stuff them in the mine, I say. A bit of hard work never hurt anyone, and a clip'o'the ears to any brigand who says otherwise. It's all about the bottom line, what?”*
